sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Box, Button, Flex, Heading, Image, Text, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import Shivam from "../Image/Shivam.JPG"; import Shivam_Resume from "../Components/Shivam_Resume.pdf"; import { AiFillGithub, AiFillLinkedin, AiOutlineMail, AiOutlinePhone, } from "react-icons/ai"; import { Icon } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const About = () => { const resumeOpen = () => { window.open(Shivam_Resume); }; return ( About Me Hey ! I'm   Shivam Strong in design and integration with intuitive problem-solving skills.Proficient in HTML,CSS,JAVASCRIPT and MERN STACK. Passionate about implementing and launching new projects Github LinkedIN ); }; export default About;
